title: Management Team | Phoenix Technologies
meta_description: Our experienced management team brings together diverse backgrounds, deep expertise, and a proven track record of success. United by a shared vision, they drive Phoenix Technologies forward with innovation, leadership, and dedication.

team_members.name: Thomas Taroni
team_members.title: Group CEO Phoenix Technologies
team_members.description: Thomas Taroni, the Executive Chairman and co-founder of Phoenix Technologies, has been a driving force in the IT hardware and software industry.

team_members.description: Carla B端nger, co-founder and Vice-Chairwoman of Phoenix Technologies, is recognized as one of Switzerland's Digital Shapers.

team_members.name: Angel Nunez Mencias
team_members.title: Board Member and CEO
team_members.description: Angel Nunez Mencias is the Group's Chief Technical/Client Officer (CTO/CCO) of Phoenix Technologies AG.
